name: Ambler Glade Beanie - Unisex
description: With its oversized pom and thick cuff, the Glade beanie will have you remembering your favourite childhood toque.Soft and cozy fleece headband.Handmade in Nepal, as part of Ambler's Himalayan Collection, which helps more women in Nepal learn a skilled trade and create a livelihood that supports and empowers women in the developing world.One size fits all.
